about_the_game: A supercharged 650 hp 6.2L V8 engine, manual 6-speed transmission, launch control… all with rear-wheel drive! This legendary American muscle car burns rubber and makes Extreme-Khana a thrilling driving experience.
detailed_description: A supercharged 650 hp 6.2L V8 engine, manual 6-speed transmission, launch control… all with rear-wheel drive! This legendary American muscle car burns rubber and makes Extreme-Khana a thrilling driving experience.

Warning: This is a virtual game and not real life. Be cautious, do not imitate the vehicle movements shown in this game when you are driving a car in real life. Remember: drive safely!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only
